00035 void t_editortool::mouse_motion_event(SDL_MouseMotionEvent &evt)
00036 {
00037     mouse_img_pos= t_pgrid::getinstance()->current_workspace()->screen2img(evt.x, evt.y);
00038     mouse_buttons= evt.state;
00039     lastmousemove.x= evt.xrel;
00040     lastmousemove.y= evt.yrel;
00041 }
00042 void t_editortool::mouse_button_event(SDL_MouseButtonEvent &evt)
00043 {
00044     mouse_img_pos= t_pgrid::getinstance()->current_workspace()->screen2img(evt.x, evt.y);
00045     if(evt.type==SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP) mouse_buttons&= ~(SDL_BUTTON(evt.button));
00046     else mouse_buttons|= SDL_BUTTON(evt.button);
00047 }
00048 
00049 void t_editortool::phys_tick(float time)
00050 {
00051     if(editor->lerpmouse())
00052     {
00053         t_pgrid *g= t_pgrid::getinstance();
00054         vec v= g->getmousevel();
00055         v.mul(1.0/g->current_workspace()->getzoom());
00056         float t= g->phystime()*0.001 - g->framephystime()*0.001;
00057         v.mul(t);
00058         lerpedmousepos= g->current_workspace()->screen2img(int(g->mousepos.x), int(g->mousepos.y));
00059         lerpedmousepos.add(v);
00060     }
00061     else
00062         lerpedmousepos= mouse_img_pos;
00063 }
